articles.author: Charles Trepany, USA TODAY
articles.title: ‘American Idol’: Formerly homeless singer blows Katy Perry away with judge’s own song - USA TODAY
articles.description: "American Idol" reminded this week that it doesn't matter where you come from — so long as you have what it takes to become a star.
articles.content:
On "American Idol," it doesn't matter where you come from — so long as you have what it takes to become a star.
That theme rang true on Sunday night's episode, which saw several contestants who pers… [+3837 chars]

articles.author: Ramishah Maruf, CNN Business
articles.title: American Express suspends operations in Russia and Belarus - CNN
articles.description: American Express is the latest credit card company to announce it is ending its operations in Russia as its invasion into Ukraine escalates.

articles.title: Lessons from the 1918 Spanish Flu epidemic - CBS News
articles.description: The influenza pandemic that killed 675,000 Americans a century ago is often referred to as the "forgotten flu." Also forgotten: lessons it might have taught us for how to deal with the cost, in lives, of COVID-19.
articles.content: Look at the dates: 1890-1918; 1878-1918; 1896-1918; 1917-1918 ... Every person buried on this snowy slope in Barre, Vt, died within days, weeks of each other. "It's pretty humbling," said Brian Zecch… [+5954 chars]
